typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Matching value LMDB} as string,
		{Matching value LMDB II} as string,
		{Site Ship To (char)} as integer,
		Date as string,
		{Transaction Time} as string,
		{Transaction ID} as integer,
		{Card Number} as integer,
		{Transaction Value} as decimal(9,3),
		{Transaction Quantity} as decimal(9,3)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> ASQLLOYALTY
source(output(
		RETAIL_TRANSACTION_ID as string,
		RETAIL_SITE_ID as string,
		EVENT_START_DATE as string,
		SALES_QUANTITY as string,
		SALES_AMOUNT as string,
		LOYALTY_IND as string,
		SALE_OR_RETURN_INDICATOR as string,
		SYSTEM_ID as string,
		SALES_TRANSACTION_NUMBER as string,
		CALENDAR_YEAR_C as string,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		START_DATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADLSPOS
ASQLLOYALTY derive({Merged Date} = toTimestamp(concat(Date,' ',{Transaction Time}),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive({Merged Date Ahead} = add({Merged Date} , seconds(240)),
		{Merged Date Behind} = add({Merged Date} , seconds(-240))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
